atk-abh02a1:2_1: Idāni tadanantare āyatanavibhaṅganiddese suttantabhājanīyaṁ tāva dassento dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a1:5_0: Tattha visesato tāva cakkhatīti cakkhu; rūpaṁ assādeti, vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti rūpaṁ;
atk-abh02a1:5_1: vaṇṇavikāraṁ āpajjamānaṁ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṁ. Sappatīti saddo; udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṁ. Gandhayatīti gandho;
atk-abh02a1:5_2: attano vatthuṁ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṁ avhāyatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṁ sattāti raso; assādentīti attho.
atk-abh02a1:5_3: Kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṁ. Manatīti mano.
atk-abh02a1:6_2: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭṭenti vāyamantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:6_3: Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārentīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:6_4: Idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:6_5: Iti sabbepi me dhammā āyatanato āyānaṁ tananato āyatassa ca nayanato ‘āyatanaṁ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a1:7_2: Tathā hi loke ‘‘issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ āyatananti vuccati .
atk-abh02a1:7_4: Sāsane pana ‘‘manorame āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 5.38) samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:7_6: ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 5.23) kāraṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:8_0: Cakkhurūpādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:8_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā taṁ nissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro.
atk-abh02a1:8_5: taṁ nissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ kāraṇaṁ, tesaṁ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, ākaraṭṭhena, samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, sañjātidesaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a1:8_6: kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā ‘āyatanaṁ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a1:8_7: Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṁ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha ‘atthato’ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a1:9_1: Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:10_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva.
atk-abh02a1:10_2: Evaṁ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce?
atk-abh02a1:10_4: Idha channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayameva tesaṁ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni.
atk-abh02a1:10_5: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṁ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṁ . Tathā itarāni itaresaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:10_8: Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti.
atk-abh02a1:11_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
atk-abh02a1:11_1: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:11_3: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni. Tato ghānāyatanādīni tīṇi.
atk-abh02a1:11_5: Cakkhādīnaṁ pana gocarattā tassa tassa anantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
atk-abh02a1:11_6: Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi ayameva tesaṁ kamo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a1:11_7: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa’’nti (ma. ni.
atk-abh02a1:12_0: ‘Saṅkhepavitthārā’ti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena,
atk-abh02a1:12_1: tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
atk-abh02a1:13_0: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
atk-abh02a1:13_1: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṁ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
atk-abh02a1:14_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato’ti ettha pana sabbānevetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:14_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
atk-abh02a1:14_6: Tasmā anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Tathā nirīhato abyāpārato ca.
atk-abh02a1:14_7: Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṁ evaṁ hoti – ‘aho vata amhākaṁ sāmaggiyā viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā’ti,
atk-abh02a1:14_8: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti;
atk-abh02a1:14_9: atha kho dhammatāvesā yaṁ cakkhurūpādīnaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti.
atk-abh02a1:14_11: Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
atk-abh02a1:14_12: bāhirāni gāmaghātakacorā viya ajjhattikānaṁ abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘cakkhu, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a1:14_14: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṁ gocarā viyāti.
atk-abh02a1:15_0: Idāni tesaṁ vipassitabbākāraṁ dassetuṁ cakkhuṁ aniccantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:15_1: Tattha cakkhu tāva hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:15_2: Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṁ – uppādavayavantato, vipariṇāmato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭikkhepatoti.
atk-abh02a1:16_1: Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ pāpuṇāti, ṭhitiyaṁ jarāya kilamati, jaraṁ patvā avassaṁ bhijjati;
atk-abh02a1:17_1: Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ mā pāpuṇātu, ṭhānappattaṁ mā jiratu,
atk-abh02a1:17_2: jarappataṁ mā bhijjatūti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
atk-abh02a1:17_3: suññaṁ tena vasavattanākārena; tasmā suññato, assāmikato, akāmakāriyato,
atk-abh02a1:18_4: Apicettha ṭhapetvā cakkhuṁ tebhūmakadhammā aniccā, no cakkhu.
atk-abh02a1:18_5: Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva aniccañca. Tathā sesadhammā dukkhā, no cakkhu.
atk-abh02a1:18_6: Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva dukkhañca. Sesadhammā anattā, no cakkhu.
atk-abh02a1:18_7: Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva anattā cāti. Rūpādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a1:19_0: Imasmiṁ pana suttantabhājanīye tathāgatena kiṁ dassitanti?
atk-abh02a1:19_2: Sammāsambuddho hi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassento aniccena vā dasseti, dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Tattha ‘‘cakkhu, attāti yo vadeyya, taṁ na upapajjati.
atk-abh02a1:19_4: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:19_5: Tasmā taṁ na upapajjati – cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya iti cakkhu anattā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.422).
atk-abh02a1:19_6: Imasmiṁ sutte aniccena anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. ‘‘Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā. Rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa,
atk-abh02a1:19_8: labbhetha ca rūpe – evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosīti. Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a1:19_9: rūpaṁ anattā tasmā rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati;
atk-abh02a1:19_10: na ca labbhati rūpe – evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu,
atk-abh02a1:19_11: evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.59; mahāva.
atk-abh02a1:19_12: 20) imasmiṁ sutte dukkhena anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. ‘‘Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ, yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ dukkhaṁ tadanattā, yadanattā taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh02a1:19_13: 3.15) aniccadukkhehi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. Kasmā? Aniccadukkhānaṁ pākaṭattā.
atk-abh02a1:20_0: Hatthato hi taṭṭake vā sarake vā kismiñcideva vā patitvā bhinne ‘aho anicca’nti vadanti. Evaṁ aniccaṁ pākaṭaṁ nāma.
atk-abh02a1:20_1: Attabhāvasmiṁ pana gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi vā viddhāsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vadanti. Evaṁ dukkhaṁ pākaṭaṁ nāma.
atk-abh02a1:20_2: Anattalakkhaṇaṁ apākaṭaṁ andhakāraṁ avibhūtaṁ duppaṭivijjhaṁ duddīpanaṁ duppaññāpanaṁ .
atk-abh02a1:20_3: Aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā paññāyanti.
atk-abh02a1:20_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṁ vinā buddhuppādā na paññāyati, buddhuppādeyeva paññāyati.
atk-abh02a1:20_5: Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṁ dukkha’nti vattuṁ sakkonti,
atk-abh02a1:20_7: Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyuṁ,
atk-abh02a1:20_9: Anattalakkhaṇapaññāpanañhi aññassa kassaci avisayo, sabbaññubuddhānameva visayo.
atk-abh02a1:20_11: Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassento aniccena vā dassesi, dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā.
atk-abh02a1:20_12: Idha pana taṁ aniccadukkhehi dassesīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:21_0: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, kena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhahanti?
atk-abh02a1:21_1: Aniccalakkhaṇaṁ tāva udayabbayānaṁ amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, santatiyā paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_2: Dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_3: Anattalakkhaṇaṁ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, ghanena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_4: Udayabbayaṁ pana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_5: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṁ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_6: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:22_0: Ettha ca aniccaṁ aniccalakkhaṇaṁ, dukkhaṁ dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:22_2: Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṁ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā, hutvā abhāvato vā;
atk-abh02a1:22_5: ‘‘Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ dukkhaṁ. Kasmā? Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato;
atk-abh02a1:22_7: ‘‘Yaṁ dukkhaṁ taṁ anattā’’ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato;
atk-abh02a1:22_11: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā nāma.
atk-abh02a1:23_0: Saṅkhepato panettha dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve tebhūmakāni.
atk-abh02a1:26_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānaṁ upakāratthāya ‘‘cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatana’’nti yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni,
atk-abh02a1:26_2: tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṁ sabbākārato sabhāvadassanatthaṁ ‘‘cakkhāyatanaṁ sotāyatana’’nti evaṁ ajjhattikabāhiravavatthānanayena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a1:27_1: Tesaṁ niddesavāre tattha katamaṁ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:28_1: Yaṁ panetaṁ dhammāyatananiddese ‘‘tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu?
atk-abh02a1:29_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti.
atk-abh02a1:29_1: ‘Suttaṁ āharā’ti ca vutte ‘‘nibbānaṁ nibbānanti kho, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? Yo kho, āvuso,
atk-abh02a1:29_2: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṁ vuccati nibbāna’’nti etaṁ jambukhādakasuttaṁ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a1:29_4: So vattabbo – ‘kiṁ pana yathā cetaṁ suttaṁ tathā attho’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘āma ,
atk-abh02a1:29_6: Tato vattabbo – ‘idaṁ tāva te suttaṁ ābhataṁ; anantarasuttaṁ āharā’ti.
atk-abh02a1:29_7: Anantarasuttaṁ nāma – ‘‘arahattaṁ arahattanti, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso, arahattanti? Yo kho, āvuso,
atk-abh02a1:29_8: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṁ vuccati arahatta’’nti (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh02a1:30_0: Imasmiṁ pana naṁ ābhate āhaṁsu – ‘nibbānaṁ nāma dhammāyatanapariyāpanno dhammo, arahattaṁ cattāro khandhā.
atk-abh02a1:30_1: Nibbānaṁ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṁ pucchitopi arahattaṁ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha.
atk-abh02a1:30_2: Kiṁ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṁ udāhu nāna’nti? ‘Ekaṁ vā hotu nānaṁ vā.
atk-abh02a1:30_3: Ko ettha tayā atibahuṁ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṁ karontena attho’? ‘Na tvaṁ ekaṁ nānaṁ jānāsīti.
atk-abh02a1:30_4: Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṁ punappunaṁ pucchito vañcetuṁ asakkonto āha – ‘rāgādīnaṁ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a1:30_6: Lañjaṁ datvāpi taṁ vadāpento etadeva vadāpeyya.
atk-abh02a1:30_7: Yatheva ca te etaṁ vibhajitvā kathitaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:30_8: evaṁ idampi sallakkhehi – nibbānañhi āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:31_0: Sace evaṁ vutte saññattiṁ gacchati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ; no ce, bahunibbānatāya kāretabbo. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh02a1:31_1: Evaṁ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo udāhu dosamohānampi?
atk-abh02a1:31_2: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi?
atk-abh02a1:31_3: Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti?
atk-abh02a1:32_0: Tato vattabbo – ‘tava vāde rāgakkhayo ekaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti, dosakkhayo ekaṁ, mohakkhayo ekaṁ;
atk-abh02a1:32_1: tiṇṇaṁ akusalamūlānaṁ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti,
atk-abh02a1:32_9: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
atk-abh02a1:32_11: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:33_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, oḷārikatāya kāretabbo. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh02a1:33_3: Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā nāma honti.
atk-abh02a1:33_6: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:34_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, gotrabhunāpi kāretabbo. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh02a1:34_1: Evaṁ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘tvaṁ gotrabhu nāma atthīti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vadāmī’ti.
atk-abh02a1:34_2: ‘Gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti, khīyissantī’ti? Na khīṇā, na khīyanti; apica kho khīyissantīti.
atk-abh02a1:34_4: ‘Tava gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesā na khīṇā, na khīyanti; atha kho khīyissanti.
atk-abh02a1:34_5: Tvaṁ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ paññapesi,
atk-abh02a1:34_6: appahīnesu anusayesu anusayappahānaṁ nibbānaṁ paññapesi. Taṁ te na sameti.
atk-abh02a1:34_7: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:35_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, maggena kāretabbo. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh02a1:35_1: Evaṁ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘tvaṁ maggaṁ nāma vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti. ‘Maggakkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti, khiyissantī’ti?
atk-abh02a1:35_2: Jānamāno vakkhati – ‘khīṇāti vā khīyissantīti vā vattuṁ na vaṭṭati, khīyantīti vattuṁ vaṭṭatī’ti. ‘Yadi evaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:35_5: Maggo katamaṁ kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā katame kilese khepeti? Tasmā mā evaṁ gaṇha.
atk-abh02a1:35_6: Nibbānaṁ pana āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:36_0: Evaṁ vutte evamāha – ‘tvaṁ āgamma āgammāti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti.
atk-abh02a1:36_1: ‘Āgamma nāmāti idaṁ te kuto laddha’nti? ‘Suttato laddha’nti . ‘Āhara sutta’nti.
atk-abh02a1:36_2: ‘‘Evaṁ avijjā ca taṇhā ca taṁ āgamma, tamhi khīṇā, tamhi bhaggā, na ca kiñci kadācī’’ti.
atk-abh02a1:40_1: Idhāpi pañhāpucchake yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati,
atk-abh02a1:40_2: taṁ sabbaṁ pucchitvā labbhamānavaseneva vissajjanaṁ vuttaṁ; na kevalañca idha,
atk-abh02a1:40_4: Idha pana dasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ rūpabhāvena abyākatatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a1:40_5: Dvinnaṁ āyatanānaṁ khandhavibhaṅge catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ viya kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a1:40_6: Kevalañhi cattāro khandhā sappaccayāva saṅkhatāva dhammāyatanaṁ pana ‘‘siyā appaccayaṁ, siyā asaṅkhata’’nti āgataṁ.
atk-abh02a1:40_7: Ārammaṇattikesu ca anārammaṇaṁ sukhumarūpasaṅkhātaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ na-vattabbakoṭṭhāsaṁ bhajati.
atk-abh02a1:40_8: Tañca kho anārammaṇattā na parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammārammaṇattāti ayamettha viseso. Sesaṁ tādisameva.
atk-abh02a1:40_9: Idhāpi hi cattāro khandhā viya dvāyatanā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṁvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa ca parittārammaṇāti sabbaṁ khandhesu vuttasadisamevāti.
